summary: Completed comprehensive backend API testing for FastAPI CRUD Lab. All core CRUD operations, validation, search, pagination, and statistics endpoints working correctly. Minor routing configuration issue with landing page.

minor_issues.issue: Landing page route serves React frontend instead of backend HTML page
minor_issues.impact: Backend landing page not accessible at root route
minor_issues.details: Kubernetes ingress routing directs '/' to frontend, backend API routes work correctly via '/api/*' prefix

passed_tests: Create item with valid data (POST /api/items) - 201 response
Get single item by ID (GET /api/items/{id}) - 200 response
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Configure ingress routing to serve backend landing page at root '/' route instead of frontend, or document that backend HTML page is intentionally not served at root
